<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// thread returning from sendMessage and handleDisconnect being called from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
